column5: Where is the store and what time does it open? Thank you.
[font color=green size=3][b]The grocery store is on the east side of the highway, just before the Trillium. Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby
Thank you. Any idea what time it opens?
There are 2 grocery stores, the other (wilson's foods) is one block behind the trillium motel. Went there 2 weeks ago & I think it opens @ 7:00am. Hope that helps.
I fly out of Ear Falls also. If you are pressed for time, you might try having your outfitter getting your vittles ahead of time from the grocer. That's what we do and it works great.
